About Team Vindicta

Born from a shared passion for competitive Warhammer 40,000, we are a brotherhood of players dedicated to excellence, sportsmanship, and growing the community.

üèõÔ∏è Our Origins

Team Vindicta was founded in 2020 during the COVID-19 pandemic, when a group of Long Island Warhammer enthusiasts connected over their shared love of competitive play. What started as casual Tabletop Simulator sessions evolved into something greater‚Äîa team with a mission.

The name "Vindicta" comes from the Latin word for vengeance, reflecting our competitive spirit and determination to dominate the tabletop battlefield. But vengeance isn't just about winning‚Äîit's about redemption, improvement, and always coming back stronger.

"In the darkness of the far future, there is only war. But among brothers, there is victory."
